title: The Miraculous Mellops. Part 2
creator_credit: Karl Zwicky, Posie Graeme-Evans and Millenium Pictures
brief_description: Gamma Jane and Alpha Ralph are continuing to search for a replacement for the Grand Baby. Sam and Jason Mellops match wits with their brother Michael and Harmony Dump, to retrieve the magic articles which endow the “user” with special powers including the ability to fly, time-travel, be speedy and master languages. Mr. Dump is eager to obtain these powers for himself so he can make a million dollars.
